website_summaries.verdict: Very durable hammer holster made from a high-quality leather.
pros: Made with cap over the rivets to keep from scratching your hammer's finish
Works for belts up to three inches wide
Can also carry an ax or hatchet without a problem
cons: This is a large hammer holster at 10 inches in length and might be a little big for shorter people

customer_reviews.title: Great for a firefighter and fairly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits an axe well and fits the safety belt well. We will see how the leather holds up.
customer_reviews.author: kimjo81

customer_reviews.title: Not bad! The leather is great
customer_reviews.text: Not bad! The leather is great. I've used it for 2 weeks now, and it's holding up very well. Wish it were a tad more ridged, and it would get 5 stars. Very happy with it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patrick

customer_reviews.title: very nice holder
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because i wanted to ensure my hatchet was on my person at all times and not left in the yard where if i put it on the ground and forgot it then kids might find it, you know the story.. It fits my hatchet real nice and then i bought the FAIRWIN Web Holster Belt to put it on because most of my belts lol are nice belts and not meant for outside work and to hang things on like this.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This item is larger than you think it is! Looks smallish in the photos, but can carry a full-size axe with no problems. The quality of the leather and workmanship is EXCELLENT.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Columbia River Knife and Tool (CRKT) 2730 RMJ Woods Chogan T-Hawk Carbon Steel Axe. Very heavy duty and fits up to a three inch wide belt. Also holds my framing hammer and hand axe.
customer_reviews.author: MasterSergeantUSAF

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The studs are low profile and shouldn't scratch against what you put into the holster. I'm using this for a decorative axe, and don't want to scratch the finish too much. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding small hatchets
customer_reviews.text: I keep a small hatchet in this and works for what it is. I go hunting with this on my side and i wrapped the ring with duct tape to prevent the noise of the hatchet banging on the metal ring. No complaints, have been using this for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Graham

customer_reviews.title: Almost too large to use for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hatchet holder thinking it was a better looking style/quality than what was in our local hardware store. This hatchet holder is extremely large and not as handy as the smaller $4 hatchet holder we found. It looks great but for its use this hatchet holder is not as practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made tool hanger. The leather is thick and properly oiled. The ring is heavy and well anchored.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Good price. Should last a while. I use it with a eastwing 14" hatchet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good will made product. Leather is thick and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Normand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, I'll be buying a few more
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy duty and overbuilt. Excellent product, I'll be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Day one looks good and strong only disappointment is the rivets protrude from ...
customer_reviews.text: Day one looks good and strong only disappointment is the rivets protrude from the back even thou they are covered in leather I feel like they could become irritating over time
customer_reviews.author: Ridehighordie

customer_reviews.title: Try keeping the leather conditioned
customer_reviews.text: It holds a big hammer. Let's see how the leather lasts!
customer_reviews.author: ray szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the lift. bubba.  I will tomahawk hold this in.
customer_reviews.text: Good price good product like the design thanks. Product seems to be good quality and will perform well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: erty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my hatchet and sturdy enough to draw the axe out without getting snagged.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald j cash

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a bloody axe holder for a halloween costume! #perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I modified it to soften the metal surface scoring. A simple paracord braid.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Well made leather holder.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and durable item and fits my hatchet very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Holds hatchet securely.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Arrived quickly, good packaging. My hatchet does not work it's way out, like the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: I think it will work
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used this yet. I bought a couple of tomahawks to customize and taking camping/hiking and figured I would try this to carry them. obviously this is meant for a more level surface though. Just walking around a long hawk handle will be hitting you in the calf and if you are wearing it sitting down won't be comfy. But I think this thing works as intended. Don't let the dog chew on it and it should hold.
customer_reviews.author: George Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Holds my tool just right
customer_reviews.text: I use a big hammer, if you know what I mean, and need assistance in holding my hammer when not in need of immediate use and would recommend this product to hold your hammer as well.
customer_reviews.author: DOGBOX

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This guy has the best tool belts etc. Its a fraction of the price of the Occidental leather and equal or better quality. Not to mention great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: michael batjiaka

product_meta.title: Style N Craft 98-438 Hammer/Hatchet Holder in Heavy Top Grain Leather
product_meta.description: Hammer/Hatchet holder in heavy top grain leather in tan color; Metal hammer holder; Rivets with caps for safety; All hardware in antique finish; Fits belt size unto 3" wide; Color - Tan.
feature_bullets: Hammer/Hatchet holder in heavy top grain leather
Rivets with caps for safety ; All hardware in antique finish
